name: Sophomore Review Portfolio
description: The sophomore review portfolio is a collection of work you should have completed for courses that are typically taken by the end of the sophomore year.

workGroups.name: At least two studio art samples
workGroups.description: Provide at least two work samples you completed during ART-1110, ART-1230, and/or ART-2230.

workGroups.name: At least two software skills samples
workGroups.description: Provide at least two work samples you completed during VCD-1100 and/or VCD-1150.

workGroups.name: At least two other coursework samples
workGroups.description: Provide at least two samples of your work from other classes you've taken in this program to date such as from VCD-2200 Typography, VCD-2400 Graphic Design I, or VCD-2600 Web Design I.

workGroups.name: Other work
workGroups.description: Provide other work samples that evidence skills relevant to this major.
